019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022
023import java.nio.charset.Charset;
024import java.time.Clock;
025import java.util.Locale;
026import java.util.ResourceBundle;
027
028import org.apiguardian.api.API;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
030
031/**
032 *  The types of the special properties for a configuration bean.
033 *
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @version $Id: SpecialPropertyType.java 1001 2022-01-29 16:42:15Z tquadrat $
036 *  @since 0.0.1
037 *
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 *
040 *  @see SpecialProperty
041 */
042@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SpecialPropertyType.java 1001 2022-01-29 16:42:15Z tquadrat $" )
043@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
044public enum SpecialPropertyType
045{
046        /*------------------*\
047    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
048        \*------------------*/
049    /**
050     *  <p>{@summary The current
051      * {@link Charset}.}</p>
052     *  <p>The property will be initialised with a call to
053     *  {@link java.nio.charset.Charset#defaultCharset()},
054     *  and the same will be made also when the setter is called with the
055     *  argument {@code null} later.</p>
056     *  <p>Getter and setter for this special are defined in
057     *  {@link ConfigBeanSpec}.</p>
058     *
059     *  @see java.nio.charset.Charset
060     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#getCharset()
061     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#setCharset(java.nio.charset.Charset)
062     */
063    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
064    CONFIG_PROPERTY_CHARSET( "charset" ),
065
066    /**
067     *  <p>{@summary The current
068      * {@link Clock}.}</p>
069     *  <p>The property will be initialised with a call to
070     *  {@link java.time.Clock#systemUTC()},
071     *  and the same call will be made also when the setter is called with the
072     *  argument {@code null} later.</p>
073     *  <p>Getter and setter for this special property can be added to a
074     *  configuration bean specification.</p>
075     *
076     *  @see java.time.Clock
077     */
078    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
079    CONFIG_PROPERTY_CLOCK( "clock" ),
080
081    /**
082     *  <p>{@summary The current
083      * {@link Locale}.}</p>
084     *  <p>The property will be initialised with a call to
085     *  {@link java.util.Locale#getDefault()},
086     *  and the same call will be made also when the setter is called with the
087     *  argument {@code null}.</p>
088     *  <p>Getter and setter for this property are defined in
089     *  {@link ConfigBeanSpec}.</p>
090     *
091     *  @see java.util.Locale
092     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#getLocale()
093     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#setLocale(java.util.Locale)
094     */
095    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
096    CONFIG_PROPERTY_LOCALE( "locale" ),
097
098    /**
099     *  <p>{@summary The message prefix.}</p>
100     *  <p>A getter for this special property is added to a configuration bean
101     *  specification with the
102     *  {@link I18nSupport};
103     *  a setter for it is not allowed.</p>
104     */
105    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
106    CONFIG_PROPERTY_MESSAGEPREFIX( "messagePrefix" ),
107
108    /**
109     *  <p>{@summary The process id.}</p>
110     *  <p>A getter for this special property can be added to a configuration
111     *  bean specification; a setter for it is not allowed.</p>
112     */
113    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
114    CONFIG_PROPERTY_PID( "processId" ),
115
116    /**
117     *  <p>{@summary A random number generator.}</p>
118     *  <p>A getter for this special property can be added to a configuration
119     *  bean specification; a setter for it is not allowed.</p>
120     */
121    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
122    CONFIG_PROPERTY_RANDOM( "random" ),
123
124    /**
125     *  <p>{@summary The
126     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
127     *  for messages and other texts.}</p>
128     *  <p>A getter for this property is defined in
129     *  {@link ConfigBeanSpec},
130     *  a setter is optional.</p>
131     *
132     *  @note   This property is also used internally.
133     *
134     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#getResourceBundle()
135     *  @see I18nSupport
136     */
137    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
138    CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE( "resourceBundle" ),
139
140    /**
141     *  <p>{@summary The session key.}</p>
142     *  <p>A getter for this special property is defined in
143     *  {@link SessionBeanSpec};
144     *  a setter for it is not allowed, and the special property may not be
145     *  used in other contexts than that of a session bean.</p>
146     *
147     *  @see SessionBeanSpec#getSessionKey()
148     */
149    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
150    CONFIG_PROPERTY_SESSION( "session" ),
151
152    /**
153     *  <p>{@summary The current time zone.}</p>
154     *  <p>The property will be initialised with a call to
155     *  {@link java.time.ZoneId#systemDefault()},
156     *  and this call will be made also when the setter is called with the
157     *  argument {@code null} later.</p>
158     *  <p>Getter and setter for this property are defined in
159     *  {@link ConfigBeanSpec}.</p>
160     *
161     *  @see java.time.ZoneId
162     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#getTimezone()
163     *  @see ConfigBeanSpec#setTimezone(java.time.ZoneId)
164     */
165    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
166    CONFIG_PROPERTY_TIMEZONE( "timezone" );
167
168        /*------------*\
169    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
170        \*------------*/
171    /**
172     *  The name of the property.
173     */
174    private final String m_PropertyName;
175
176        /*--------------*\
177    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
178        \*--------------*/
179    /**
180     *  Creates a new instance of {@code SpecialPropertyType}.
181     *
182     *  @param  name    The name of the property.
183     */
184    private SpecialPropertyType( final String name )
185    {
186        m_PropertyName = name;
187    }   //  SpecialPropertyType()
188
189        /*---------*\
190    ====** Methods **==========================================================
191        \*---------*/
192    /**
193     *  Returns the property name for the special property.
194     *
195     *  @return The property name.
196     */
197    public final String getPropertyName() { return m_PropertyName; }
198}
199//  enum SpecialPropertyType
200
201/*
202 *  End of File
203 */
